page.title: 06FAMILY LIFE
page.content: MY NAME IS DONNA MARSHALL AND I AM ELEVEN. ON SUNDAY MORNING I GOT UP, GOT DRESSED, HAD BREAKFAST (TOAST), WASHED AND CLEANED MY TEETH. I DID MY HAIR AND WENT OUTSIDE TO PLAY CATCH, CHASE AND FOOTBALL WITH DANIEL, DUNCAN AND MARK WHO ARE MY COUSINS. THEIR MUM AND DAD ARE CALLED MARGARET AND ALAN. MY BROTHER IS CALLED DEAN. AT 1.OO IT WAS DINNER TIME WITH MY MUM AND DAD AND DEAN. WE HAD BEEF, PEAS, CARROTS,NEW POTATOES, ROAST POTATOES AND GRAVY. FOR AFTERS I HAD A CUP OF TEA. AT 2.OO I PLAYED WITH MY COUSINS AGAIN. WE PLAYED FOOTBALL AND CATCH. AT 3.OO I WENT FOR A WALK ROUND THE VILLAGE AND AT 4.OO DUNCAN, DANIEL AND I WENT TO NANS FOR TEA. AT 5.OO THE REST OF THE FAMILY CAME FOR TEA. WE HAD SANDWICHES, JELLY AND ICE-CREAM.
